title: Record Type
description: TYPO3 CMS Content Blocks Record Type

table.description: Defines the table name for the database.

typeName.description: Identifier to distinguish this Content Block from other types in the same table.

labelField.description: Field identifier which should be used as the title of the record.

fallbackLabelFields.description: Defines which fields should be used as fallback, if labelField is not filled.

typeField.description: The field identifier to use as the type switch.

languageAware.description: If set to false, language related fields are not created.

editLocking.description: If set to false, the functionality to lock the editing for editors is removed.

restriction.description: There are several restrictions in TYPO3, which filter records by certain constraints.

disabled.description: Adds a checkbox to hide the record in the frontend.

startTime.description: Adds a date picker to set the start time when to display the record.

endTime.description: Adds a date picker to set the end time when to stop displaying the record.

userGroup.description: Adds a selection to choose user groups, which are allowed to view the record.

softDelete.description: When deleting records in the TYPO3 backend, they are not really deleted in the database.

trackCreationDate.description: Tracks the timestamp of the creation date.

trackUpdateDate.description: Tracks the timestamp of the last update.

trackAncestorReference.description: If set to false, the tracking field for the original record will not be created.

sortField.description: The field identifier to use for sorting records.

internalDescription.description: If enabled, this adds a new tab Notes with a description field.

rootLevelType.description: Restricts the place, where the record can be created.
